author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO A LITTLE STRONGER WHILE IT MOVES NORTHWESTWARD...
summary: ...MARIO A LITTLE STRONGER WHILE IT MOVES NORTHWESTWARD... As of 2:00 PM MST Mon Sep 15 the center of Mario was located near 20.8, -114.4 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MARIO A LITTLE STRONGER WHILE IT MOVES NORTHWESTWARD... As of 2:00 PM MST Mon Sep 15 the center of Mario was located near 20.8, -114.4 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
